H0.text: Ikarus was the codename for the proposed German invasion of which country. United Kingdom

H1.text: Ikarus was the codename for the proposed German invasion of which country. Soviet Union

H2.text: Ikarus was the codename for the proposed German invasion of which country. Poland

H3.text: Ikarus was the codename for the proposed German invasion of which country. Hyui

A4.text: Operation Ikarus was a Second World War German plan to invade Iceland.

A5.text: Operation Sea Lion, also written as Operation Sealion (German: Unternehmen Seel√∂we), was Nazi Germany's code name for their planned invasion of the United Kingdom.

A6.text: Germany, supported by Italy and Romania, invaded the Soviet Union in Operation Barbarossa.
